$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

max_propagation_latency.description: Allow up to this much time for data to propagate through the system.

min_polling_interval.description: Do not repeat system observations with intervals smaller than this.

min_query_diagonal.description: Do not make queries with diagonals smaller than this many meters.

repeat_query_rect_period.description: If set to a value above zero, reuse the most recent query rectangle/view every this many queries.
